description: Redesigned app layout including toolbar and left navigation look and feel and updated app content to scroll
Redesigned Link Library with better formatting and design, including link icons and animations
Added new Steam Insight tool for users to search through Steam's catalogue and view information related to that Game and its DLC
Added new Text Analysis tool to display breakdowns of character and words, as well as readablity statistics
Added new Base Conversion tool for users to easily convert between number bases
Implemented account creation and login for Admin Users to maintain the app
